title: NFL Around the League: NFC South - August 28th, 2013
itunes:title: NFL Around the League: NFC South - August 28th, 2013
description:
A room full of heroes, Gregg Rosenthal, Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling, dive into the latest NFL news and give you their MVP predictions before the crew previews the NFC South. Join the conversation on Twitter: @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
